body.para: It seems that other people are finding Dojo and are intriuged enough to want to subscribe to the list. I'm usually responding by inquiring what their interest is in Dojo and making sure that they're cool w/ our licensing terms. This is a pretty time-consuming solution from my standpoint. My goal w/ keeping the list closed (for now) is to make sure thal the signal/noise ratio is high, not just to be some sort of exclusive club.
With that in mind, does anyone have thoughts on how we might deal with this better?
